subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Carl Edwards won the Pep Boys Auto 500 on Sunday at Atlanta Motor Speedway, yet it barely kept him in Jimmie Johnson’s championship rearview mirror.
snippet: Carl Edwards won the Pep Boys Auto 500 on Sunday at Atlanta Motor Speedway, yet it barely kept him in Jimmie Johnson’s championship rearview mirror.
